title: Make progress bars visible with blue fill and show only when typing

requirements.text: Update the username input progress bar to use the blue accent color (--accent) for the fill so the progress is visible

quotes: the progress bar fill color needs to be the accent color (blue) thats why its not working

acceptanceCriteria: The username progress bar fill uses the blue accent color defined in the theme
The fill is visibly distinct from the background when progress increases

requirements.text: Update the room title input progress bar to use the blue accent color (--accent) for the fill so the progress is visible

quotes: the progress bar fill color needs to be the accent color (blue) thats why its not working

acceptanceCriteria: The room title progress bar fill uses the blue accent color defined in the theme
The fill is visibly distinct from the background when progress increases

requirements.text: Show the username input progress bar indicator only when the user is actively typing in the username field (on focus/input activity)

quotes: make the progress bar indicators only visible when being typed in

acceptanceCriteria: Progress bar is hidden by default when the username input is not focused
Progress bar becomes visible when the user focuses or types in the username input
Progress bar hides again when the input loses focus

requirements.text: Show the room title input progress bar indicator only when the user is actively typing in the room title field (on focus/input activity)

quotes: make the progress bar indicators only visible when being typed in

acceptanceCriteria: Progress bar is hidden by default when the room title input is not focused
Progress bar becomes visible when the user focuses or types in the room title input
Progress bar hides again when the input loses focus

constraints: Do not change the character limit logic or calculations
Maintain existing progress bar positioning and layout
nonGoals: Changing the character limits for username or room title
Adding progress bars to other input fields
Modifying the Header logo or username button appearance
